snippet: The HuffPost Live online network is one of the most ambitious attempts yet to rethink what TV should look and feel like when streamed over the Internet. For starters, viewers are encouraged to join in using their webcams.
abstract: The HuffPost Live online network is one of the most ambitious attempts yet to rethink what TV should look and feel like when streamed over the Internet. For starters, viewers are encouraged to join in using their webcams.

headline.main: Huffington Post Begins an Online TV Channel
headline.print_headline: Huffington Post Starts a Live Streaming Video Chat
